title: Verifying Inverses
text: Recall that $$f^{-1\left(f{\left(x\right)}\right)}=x$$ and $$f{\left(f^{-1\left(x\right)}\right)}=x$$ when f(x) and $$f^{-1\left(x\right)}$$ are inverses.

title: Verifying Inverses
text: $$f^{-1\left(f{\left(x\right)}\right)}$$ can equivalently be written as $$f^{-1\left(\frac{1}{x+1}\right)}$$. What is the function when we substitute $$x$$ with $$f(x)=\frac{1}{x+1}$$ in $$f^{-1\left(x\right)}=\frac{1}{x}-1$$.
